description.value:
You can use your shield to fend off the worst of area effects and other damage.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Raise a Shield]{Raise your Shield}, you gain your shield's circumstance bonus to Reflex saves. If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Shield Block]{Shield Block} reaction, damage you take as a result of a Reflex save can trigger that reaction, even if the damage isn't physical damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Reflexive Shield]{Effect: Reflexive Shield}
